content.question: In lines 21-40 (“There . . . home”), the speaker’s juxtaposition of her life in New Orleans with her life at “home” primarily serves to emphasize

choices.label: the harsh reality of her situation
the determination required to find a job
her struggles as an urban laborer
her lack of sympathy for her fellow laborers

content.answer: the harsh reality of her situation

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
